title: American.History.X.dvdrip{jamz}
description:
Derek Vinyard returns from prison to find his younger brother, Danny, caught in the same web of racism and hatred that landed him in prison. After Derek\&#039;s father is killed in the line of duty by a minority, Derek\&#039;s view of mankind is altered, but while in prison, he discovers that there is good and bad in every race. The task before him now is to convince Danny of his newfound enlightenment

 Avery Brooks ...  Dr. Bob Sweeney 
 Jennifer Lien ...  Davina Vinyard 

 Ethan Suplee ...  Seth Ryan
